channel.title: Considering this idea :P
channel.description:
So i started messing about with unity and i decided i might make a Firstperson rsps hmm got this upto now currently scripting some basics :P the things you do when you are bored :P btw its in 3rd person atm so i could see the char model im adding.
[img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2ll1pu8.png[/img]

item.title: Considering this idea :P
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Been tried before, and the douchebags on this forum will flame you to death for this because they have nothing better to do, so just a heads up. At least you don’t have to fight with physics the whole time. Maybe you’ll be able to make something cool out of it, I don’t know. Personally I think you would be better off manipulating the client and writing a compatible framework for it though.

Read full topic
